member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.BindingType
member.summary: Internal SDK property not intended for public use.
member.value: The Android SDK Push bindings type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.SetSenderId(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Sender ID necessary to receive push notifications.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.EnableFirebaseAnalytics
member.summary: Call this before starting Push if you are using Firebase and want to use Firebase Analytics as well. If App Center detects Firebase, the default behavior is to disable it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.CheckLaunchedFromNotification(Android.App.Activity,Android.Content.Intent)
member.summary: If you are using the event for background push notifications and your activity has a launch mode such as singleTop, singleInstance or singleTask, need to call this method in your launcher OnNewIntent override method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.IsEnabledAsync
member.summary: Check whether the Push service is enabled or not.
member.returns: A task with result being true if enabled, false if disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.SetEnabledAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable the Push service.
member.returns: A task to monitor the operation.

member.name: E:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.Push.PushNotificationReceived
member.summary: Occurs when the application receives a push notification.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.PushNotificationReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Event args for event that occurs when a push notification is received.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AppCenter.Push.PushNotificationReceivedEventArgs.CustomData
member.summary: Custom data attached to the push message.
